unnormalised: Arre yaar, Bhārat 15/08/1947 vellar svatantra zālem, punn tumkā khorench kitlea vellar mhunn zānnā āssā? Kitlō tori pixem dis āssitlem astolo!
normalised: Arre yaar, Bharatak pandhra August unnisso saytallisaak swatantratai mell'lli, punn tuka khobor asa exact kitlo vellar mhunn? Kitlo tori divso ashtto astolo!
